akas: Dueña de tu Amor Mexico (working title)
A Woman of Steel World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Dueña de tu Amor Mexico (working title)
A Woman of Steel World-wide (English title)

1.title: Vida de ensueño
1.plot: Valentina has a normal day at her office, where she announces that Alex and Lucy will take care of the earrings, while she plans her wedding. Ivana goes to see Alonso at his apartment, where they have a passionate meeting.

2.title: Beso prohibido
2.plot: Alonso tells Valentina that he will have to cancel the wedding due to problems he goes through. Ivana claims that Alonso has left her planted. Benita finds among the things of Ivana a picture of Alonso.

3.title: Bienes mancomunados
3.plot: Ivana begs Isabel not to say anything to Valentina, she is innocent and wants her cousin as a sister, begs her to do it for her who is his daughter. Valentina asks Alonso to contact Ernesto. Alonso suggests that he sell 'Los Cascabeles'.

4.title: Intento de suicidio
4.plot: Valentina will try on different wedding dresses. Felipe asks Alonso to send him to Valentina's house while he was with Ivana. Alonso assures Felipe that he misinterprets things.

5.title: Amantes
5.plot: Valentina reads a note from Ivana that says she is embarrassed to betray the people she loves most and all for a man who is worthless. Valentina is ready for Ivana to explain everything. Felipe tells Gabriela that Ivana tried to commit suicide.

6.title: Reclamo
6.plot: Isabel, indignant, informs Valentina that Alonso fired the lawyer Galeana, Valentina is disconcerted. Valentina claims to Alonso the dismissal of Ernesto. Ivana, hypocrite, is outraged by the dismissal of Ernesto.

7.title: Dura amenaza
7.plot: Felipe tells Valentina that he did not send the flowers, but he did not want to tell his cousin. Valentina answers the phone, nobody answers. Oscar does not dare to talk to Valentina and hangs up. Valentina apologizes to Ivana for having faced Oscar.

8.title: Advertencia
8.plot: Oscar tells Ivana that he got a better place than Alonso's apartment. Ivana will look for a way to spend a whole day with him. Gabriela tells Valentina that she has to know that Ivana and Alonso are cheating on her.

9.title: Bajo amenaza
9.plot: Alonso lets Oscar know that they will not share profits on Valentina's property. Ivana explodes in a rage, she can not stand that Valentina is getting married, because her cousin has everything and she swims.

10.title: Asesinato
10.plot: Ivana gets into Oscar's car, he stops in front so he does not leave, she accelerates and runs over him, approaches him, sees that he is dead and cleans his tracks. Alonso says it's not a good idea to live together.

11.title: Fotografía
11.plot: Ivana tells Benita that she has to hide her pain, but for Benita everything she does is wrong. Ernesto says he is in love with Isabel, but his love for her has no future.

12.title: Familia sorpresiva
12.plot: Valentina, surprised, sees a picture of Santiaguito, thinks the worst. Alonso arrives happy to see her, she demands to know who that child is. Ivana reads a red note in the newspaper, where it is presumed that Oscar's lover is guilty of his death.

13.title: La boda
13.plot: Nero tells Alonso that they will meet at his wedding, or rather, at his funeral. Toledo visits Alonso and tells him that he will gather enough evidence to declare him guilty.

14.title: Frente al altar
14.plot: Alonso does not arrive at his wedding with Valentina. Ivana is desperate at the airport because Alonso does not arrive or call. Valentina refuses to believe that Alonso will not arrive and runs to the church claiming that he will be there.

15.title: Los cascabeles
15.plot: Hi is my favorite I want to see al chapters

16.title: La dueña
16.plot: Valentina tells Rosendo that now that she has arrived, she will take the reins of the hacienda. Rosendo, hypocrite, apologizes to Valentina, who orders her to leave her house.

17.title: La demostración
17.plot: Narda calls Ivana to threaten her, saying she will hand over Oscar's phone to the police to track the dates and times they were called. Valentina wants to ride Altanero, Rosendo thinks that she will not be able to do it.

18.title: Víbora ponzoñosa
18.plot: Ivana looks for Rosendo to ally herself with him against Valentina and make her leave the hacienda. Ivana meets Horacio, who is shocked by her beauty.

19.title: No se vende
19.plot: Ivana looks for Rosendo to ally herself with him against Valentina and make her leave the hacienda. Ivana meets Horacio, who is shocked by her beauty.

20.title: Mordida venenosa
20.plot: Valentina realizes that it was Ivana who walked with Horacio the day before and that is why Sandra claimed him. Nerón finds Alonso's whereabouts and holsters him with a pistol, threatening him with death.

21.title: Primer beso
21.plot: Iluminada tells Ivana that José Miguel looked at Valentina with the eyes of a master. Ivana begins to plot a new plan. Ernesto tells Valentina that he must return to Mexico as soon as possible because of Alonso's swindler.

22.title: La novia
22.plot: Isabel accompanies Benita while she cleans the broken mirror of Valentina's bathroom. She asks Benita why Valentina will hate José Miguel so much. Isabel mentions that José Miguel is different.

23.title: La confrontación
23.plot: Ivana confronts Ernesto, telling him that everything finally came to light. Valentina does not understand what is happening with Ivana and asks for an explanation. Ivana tells him that Isabel and Ernesto are lovers.

24.title: Cabalgata peligrosa
24.plot: Ivana confronts Ernesto, telling him that everything finally came to light. Valentina does not understand what is happening with Ivana and asks for an explanation. Ivana tells him that Isabel and Ernesto are lovers.

25.title: Sorpresivo reencuentro
25.plot: José Miguel teaches how to ride Ivana, but on the way, the horse she rides on meets a rattle viper. Valentina claims José Miguel, tells him that if something happens to his cousin he will be the only one to blame.

26.title: Una sospechosa
26.plot: Federico meets Isabel at the hacienda, he is very happy to see her. Leonor looks for Federico, he asks if he remembers Isabel. It is resolved that Ivana spend the night at the Hacienda Montesinos.

27.title: Pareja falsa
27.plot: Valentina goes to see how Altanero woke up and finds Nazario's corpse leaning on the wall. Valentina enters the house in terror, Isabel asks what is going on. Valentina responds that Nazario is dead and sends to call the police.

28.title: Padre falso
28.plot: Crisanta enters the stables and observes the blood stain on the wall left by Nazario. Crisanta confronts Rosendo and asks him if it was he who killed Altanero. Federico asks Leonor to please return to Mexico.

29.title: La culpable
29.plot: Felipe brings Isabel the results of the X-rays to 'Los Cascabeles', tells him that Ivana has nothing and can be calm. Valentina arrives and runs to Felipe to see him in the house.

30.title: Poco tiempo de vida
30.plot: Sandra asks Horacio not to tell her that Ivana is Valentina's cousin. Valentina goes to the burial of Nazario to give her condolences to Doña Angustias, but she screams that she is a murderer.

31.title: Enfrentamientos continuos
31.plot: Isabel avoids the lawsuit between Ivana and Benita, who apologizes to Isabel for what happened. Ivana makes Valentina believe that she is talking to José Miguel, while flirting with Horacio over the phone. Ivana seduces Horacio.

32.title: Sola en el mundo
32.plot: Ivana confesses to Valentina that Isabel one day found her and Alonso kissing. Valentina tells Benita that it is very sad to realize that she is finally alone in life. Sandra tells Enriqueta that Ivana finished with José Miguel.

33.title: Humillación de vuelta
33.plot: Juan and Sabino inform José Miguel that the fence he picked up awoke shot. They suspect Valentina. Sabino tells Leonor that she should advise José Miguel to avoid Rosendo.

34.title: José Miguel está herido
34.plot: Valentina swears that José Miguel will pay them dearly. Rosendo tells Valentina that José Miguel needs a lesson for what he did to her. Benita confronts Valentina, she tells him that José Miguel humiliated her as no one had done and will pay for it.

35.title: Leonor estalla contra Valentina
35.plot: Leonor can not believe that José Miguel is hurt. He asks Felipe who shot him, he replies that it was Valentina. José Miguel asks Valentina to give him a kiss, because he does not want to die without knowing what a kiss of his is.

36.title: En su defensa
36.plot: Ivana pretends to Leonor, tells him that he hates his cousin for what he did to José Miguel and is willing to kill her. Leonor goes to the sundeck to present a formal accusation against Valentina, who tried to kill her son.

37.title: Ivana y José Miguel confiesan su amor
37.plot: Federico does not understand why José Miguel defends Valentina so much. Rosendo watches Valentina ride near the lagoon. Start admiring her as a goddess. Ivana approaches Valentina and confesses that she is in love with José Miguel.

38.title: Hacia el encuentro con la muerte
38.plot: Sabino finds Isabel in the pantheon, he confesses that what really happens to Federico is that he has cancer. Horacio gives Ivana a gold bracelet. Ivana thanks and they kiss passionately.

39.title: Felipe revela un secreto
39.plot: Horacio ends with Sandra, says he will cancel the wedding with Father Ventura, she suffers and asks if there is another woman. José Miguel thinks that he and Valentina will get along.

40.title: Ernesto pide matrimonio a Isabel
40.plot: Benita tells Isabel that she did not know Federico, but now that she knows him, she knows why she fell in love with him. Leonor, furious, challenges Federico to take Isabel to live at the Montesinos hacienda.

41.title: Se entregan al amor
41.plot: Rosendo tells Valentina that he is moving away from José Miguel because he has to be blind not to realize that he is 'doing the round' (he pretends it). José Miguel challenges Valentina to a horse race, otherwise he will return the cattle she gave him.

42.title: José Miguel declara su amor
42.plot: Valentina is stunned and says she does not want to fall in love with José Miguel, because she does not want another man to hurt her again. Iluminada asks Rosendo to leave the house of Crisanta and no longer bother her.

43.title: Ivana intrigosa
43.plot: Chuy finds Valentina in the cabin and tells him that he knows that José Miguel loves her. Ivana tells Leonor that José Miguel will never notice her because José Miguel is in love with Valentina.

44.title: Ivana inventa apuesta
44.plot: Illuminated returns very upset to the big house. Benita asks him what Rosendo did to him. Illuminated responds, altered, that I hope he will rot in hell. Horacio confesses to Ivana that he wants her to be the mother of his children.

45.title: Ivana declara su amor
45.plot: Ivana tells José Miguel that it hurts a lot to think the worst of her. José Miguel sentences Sabino that no one is going to take Valentina's mind or his heart. Valentina gets into the river to swim, while José Miguel looks at her enraptured.

46.title: Descubrimiento de Sandra
46.plot: Leonor tells Federico that Ernesto is also in love with Isabel and she corresponds to him. Sandra sees Horacio hugging Ivana. Sandra approaches them asking for an explanation.

47.title: Valentina destroza tienda
47.plot: Rosendo abuses Iluminada. Benita finds her crying in her room and asks what she has, but Iluminada does not stop crying. Rosendo tells Filadelfo to tell Valentina what he heard in the village canteen.

48.title: Federico reclama
48.plot: Horacio tells José Miguel that Valentina destroyed his store. José Miguel clarifies to Sandra that his courtship with Ivana was a joke by Horacio. Sandra tells him that Horacio did it so that she would not suspect her relationship with Ivana.

49.title: Valentina amenaza
49.plot: Valentina tells Crisanta that she understands her resentment towards Rosendo, but has no complaint about her work. Crisanta tells him that Rosendo has been stealing him for many years. Federico confesses to Isabel that he has always loved her.

50.title: Ernesto renuncia
50.plot: Ivana reveals to Valentina that José Miguel is the architect of the school she plans to build. Valentina confronts Rosendo, retaliates against him after learning that she has been stealing from him.

51.title: Horacio aclara chisme
51.plot: Rosendo tells Crisanta that he is not willing to have problems with his employer because of him. Horacio reveals to José Miguel that the rumor is running that he and Horacio made a bet to see who won Valentina first.

52.title: Ivana besa a José Miguel
52.plot: Ernesto tells Valentina that José Miguel's intention with being the architect of the school was to collaborate with a noble cause. Then, he mentions that he will leave, but when he arrives in Mexico he will look for a lawyer to take charge of the Alonso process.

53.title: Valentina confiesa
53.plot: Valentina confesses to Benita, crying, disappointed in the kiss she saw between Ivana and José Miguel, that she has always been right, since it is true that she wants Jose Miguel with all her soul.

54.title: Sandra intenta seducir
54.plot: Illuminated answers the phone, Ivana is stunned when she tells him that Alonso calls Valentina. Valentina confesses to Benita that Alonso's call took away her appetite. Ivana warns Rosendo that he does not want him to hurt José Miguel.

55.title: Declaran su amor
55.plot: Jose Miguel tells Horacio that Ivana ended their relationship because he supposedly discovered that she is in love with him. Sabino confesses to Federico that he knows that José Miguel is not his son.

56.title: Ivana furiosa
56.plot: Ivana, furious, tells Isabel that Valentina hired José Miguel to coax him and take him off and if she tries she will not allow it. Valentina, happy, kisses Ernesto and Iluminada.

57.title: Relación inaceptable
57.plot: Ivana looks for Leonor. Leonor claims her about her relationship with Horacio. Ivana insists that she loves José Miguel and tells him about the relationship between him and Valentina. Valentina and José Miguel offer and spend romantic moments in the cabin.

58.title: Filadelfo ataca
58.plot: Ivana looks for Leonor. Leonor claims her about her relationship with Horacio. Ivana insists that she loves José Miguel and tells him about the relationship between him and Valentina. Valentina and José Miguel offer and spend romantic moments in the cabin.

59.title: Ivana sometida
59.plot: Leonor finds José Miguel and Valentina kissing in her son's bedroom. Leonor brings up that Valentina is Rosendo's lover. Sandra tells Valentina that Horacio finished with her because of her cousin Ivana.

60.title: Rosendo confiesa
60.plot: Sabino tells José Miguel that no one will take him out of the head that it was Rosendo who ordered him to hit. Horacio congratulates Felipe for what he is carrying.

61.title: Horacio reclama
61.plot: Horacio asks Ivana to pretend that he kissed and caressed her. He kisses her by force. Rosendo tells Horacio to let go, pointing a gun at him. Valentina waits at the cabin for José Miguel to arrive.

62.title: José Miguel pide matrimonio
62.plot: Leonor tells José Miguel that Valentina has a bad reputation. He insists that they are gossip. Gabriela was about to run over Horacio, who reacts very rudely before such a situation, he and Gabriela are made of words.

63.title: Ivana descubierta
63.plot: Ivana reacts very badly after Valentina's statement, throws the toast that she was going to eat and leaves. Isabel goes after her. Gabriela returns on foot to the ranch, discovers Ivana kissing Rosendo.

64.title: Rosendo reclama
64.plot: Sandra and Felipe kiss, in that Horacio arrives saying that they are a very romantic couple, confronting them. Federico tells José Miguel that he is more than willing to go and ask for his girlfriend's hand.

65.title: Cena de compromiso
65.plot: José Miguel and Valentina play. José Miguel challenges Valentina to get into the water faster and hold her breath longer than he does. Valentina returns to the hacienda wearing only José Miguel's shirt.

66.title: Decisión de amor
66.plot: José Miguel tells Valentina that what she likes the most is that Ivana has accepted her wedding, but Valentina still mistrusts the sincerity of her cousin.

67.title: Implacable maldad
67.plot: José Miguel tells Valentina that what she likes the most is that Ivana has accepted her wedding, but Valentina still mistrusts the sincerity of her cousin.

68.title: Rotunda negación
68.plot: Ivana tells Leonor that she will lose José Miguel, because when she marries Valentina, she will take him to live in Los Cascabeles. Enriqueta goes to the clinic to look for Felipe, tells him that Sandra does not take him seriously.

69.title: Zafarrancho en la fiesta
69.plot: Rosendo is still obsessed with the idea of making Valentina his own. Leonor tells Federico that if he wants to go to San Pedro to meet Isabel, he can do it, but he should forget about the divorce.

70.title: Ivana al descubierto
70.plot: Rosendo is still obsessed with the idea of making Valentina his own. Leonor tells Federico that if he wants to go to San Pedro to meet Isabel, he can do it, but he should forget about the divorce.

71.title: Los rivales
71.plot: Alonso receives a call from his lawyer and Ivana, who tells him that Valentina will marry again with José Miguel Montesinos. Alonso realizes that it is his new client.

72.title: Irreparable desilusión
72.plot: Arcelia shows up at Valentina's house saying that she and José Miguel (her baby she is carrying) urgently need to talk to her. He clarifies that the child is named just like his father. Rosendo proposes to Crisanta that she be his employee in the house.

73.title: El dolor de Valentina
73.plot: Iluminada passes the phone to Valentina where José Miguel calls her, she crashes the phone on the floor. Valentina refuses to let anyone do anything to save the cabin that she burned, even at the pleas of Benita and Isabel.

74.title: Severa advertencia
74.plot: Leonor tells Federico that he wants to denounce Valentina for burning the cabin. Valentina is dead of disappointment and tells Benita that she does not want to be with anyone.

75.title: Ivana decide irse con Leonor
75.plot: Gabriela claims Valentina to be a sensible person but realizes that she was in a big mistake. Valentina gets fed up with this discussion and tells Gabriela that she can go when she decides.

76.title: Dolorosa ruptura
76.plot: José Miguel finds Ivana in his bed when he arrives at his house. The next day, he goes to 'Los Cascabeles' to find Valentina. Rosendo helps her get off her horse and they look at each other for a moment.

77.title: Rosendo es descubierto
77.plot: Ivana tells José Miguel that Valentina wants nothing more than a man to be able to avenge Alonso's rogue. Valentina, with her pain, decides to go see the remains that were left of the cabin.

78.title: Triste adiós
78.plot: José Miguel sees Sabino's house in flames. He goes crazy looking for his father, is about to enter, but Ivana stops him. José Miguel is about to leave with his father in his arms, but the house begins to fall.

79.title: Presencia desagradable
79.plot: Valentina tells Gabriela that José Miguel rejected her and prefers Ivana's company. Filadelfo informs Rosendo about Federico's death. Valentina walks through the lagoon, finds Juan repairing the fence.

80.title: José Miguel se enfurece
80.plot: Ivana is the most interested in Valentina going to jail. Ivana argues that Valentina started the fire with the intention of killing him. Sabino tells Isabel that a war will break out worse than hell itself.

81.title: Chantajes de Ivana
81.plot: Horacio goes to look for Ivana in the hacienda Montesinos, furious, he takes her with strength of the arms. She asks him to release her. The trustee tells Valentina that Ivana was the first to accuse her of homicide.

82.title: Visita inesperada
82.plot: Jose Miguel learns that the debt of the hacienda has been paid and annoyed he claims his mother because he asked Valentina for that loan. José Miguel tells Valentina that if he sees one of his animals he will end up killing them.

83.title: Verdad o sospecha
83.plot: Gabriela tells José Miguel that there is a reason why Valentina had this change so drastic, without hesitation José Miguel asks her to tell him what happened. Iluminada asks her mother why she has a garment with Rosendo's blood.

84.title: El enfrentamiento
84.plot: José Miguel and Valentina are fortuitously in the Plaza DE San Pedro. Alonso appears and tells Valentina that he went to look for her to San Pedro to reconquer her.

85.title: Rosendo besa a Leonor
85.plot: Alonso arrives at his room in the hotel and meets Ivana with a seductive pose in his bed. José Miguel accuses Valentina of having murdered Federico, when she is going to see him in the pantheon.

86.title: Aferrada a él
86.plot: Valentina warns Alonso that the town calls her the viper and that everyone fears him because he treats men as if they were damaging animals with lashes, Alonso tells him that if that can calm down his anger that lashes him.

87.title: Alonso le lleva serenata a Valentina
87.plot: Valentina seeing that Alonso serenades him, thanks him with a couple of bullets from his shotgun, shooting him from his balcony. Sabino confesses to Leonor that he always knew that he had his love affairs with Rosendo behind Federico.

88.title: Enfrentamientos con mamá
88.plot: Iluminada tells Felipe that she and Crisanta think that Rosendo murdered Nazario and asks him to keep his secret. José Miguel arrives at 'Los Cascabeles' to give Valentina the money borrowed from Leonor.

89.title: Valentina lleva serenata
89.plot: Ivana reveals to Alonso that he loves José Miguel and does not care that he has no money. Gaby asks José Miguel if Arcelia's son is really his.

90.title: Ivana abusa
90.plot: José Miguel, Horacio and Felipe go to a canteen and mourn their lack of love, drinking until they get drunk. José Miguel arrives drunk at his house and falls asleep instantly when he gets into bed. Ivana begins to seduce him and kiss him.

91.title: Golpes y mentiras
91.plot: Sandra accepts that Felipe got stuck because she does care, she will go back to live with her mom. Felipe tells Valentina that he was in the canteen with Horacio and José Miguel.

92.title: Chantaje a Leonor
92.plot: José Miguel is upset with Ivana, Leonor asks for explanations, he tells her that Ivana told Father Ventura what happened between them. Leonor argues that it is okay because Father Ventura will be the one to marry them.

93.title: Robos y fechorías
93.plot: Alonso discovers that Ivana steals some money from Valentina's house, she warns him not to say anything, but Alonso asks what he wins by not giving her away. Ernesto lets Valentina know that Rosendo charges the day laborers for letting them work.

94.title: Valentina despide a Rosendo
94.plot: Valentina arrives at the kitchen just as Rosendo pushes Iluminada, pulls her with a braid and threatens that if she keeps messing with him she will do what she did to him. Sandra is irritated because Felipe does not want to marry her.

95.title: Nuevas oportunidades
95.plot: Rosendo surprises Iluminada and warns her that he will take revenge on her even if it is the last thing he does, as well as the threat that if he says what he did to her, he already knows who will pay the consequences. Alonso asks Valentina to think about going back to him.

96.title: Búsquedas y confesiones
96.plot: Rosendo tells Valentina that he is willing to return to the hacienda without retaliation and without grudges. Horacio confesses that he did not have a valid reason to cancel his appointment, he was just very hurt because of another one.

97.title: Ivana sigue a José Miguel
97.plot: Ivana goes to 'Los Cascabeles' to tell everyone that she is going on a trip. Benita and Isabel ask where. Ivana responds that José Miguel went to see some businesses in Mexico and asked him to reach there.

98.title: José Miguel en busca de Arcelia
98.plot: Ivana leaves a letter for José Miguel at the reception of the hotel where he is staying, while he is in the bathtub, he thinks about why José Miguel had never been with a real female like her.

99.title: Fuertes enfrentamientos
99.plot: José Miguel asks Ivana what Alonso has or has had to do with her. Ivana replies that there was never anything with him. José Miguel is infuriated by Ivana's lies.

100.title: Descubriendo la verdad
100.plot: Rosendo gives some chocolates to Crisanta, tells him that they are to gain the confidence of Iluminada. Ivana receives a summons to make a statement regarding the death of Oscar Ampudia.

101.title: Supuesto embarazo
101.plot: Toledo tells Alonso that it is a great coincidence that Oscar and he had the same lover. Ivana plans to invent a pregnancy, because José Miguel was so drunk the night he passed by his side that he could not prove that nothing happened between them.

102.title: Malas noticias
102.plot: Leonor tells Rosendo that he will be the new foreman of her farm, but warns her that she should not harm her son. Rosendo promises that he will treat José Miguel as if he were his own son.

103.title: José Miguel corre a Ivana
103.plot: Ivana meets Rosendo, he begins to caress her face and tells him that that night is of demons, smells of pain and passion; he wants to love her because he is made of the same thing as him, he knows about the great passions and he has seen the face of death.

104.title: Encuentros cercanos
104.plot: Filadelfo advises Rosendo to talk to Valentina to get her job back, since she does not believe that the Montesinos ranch wins the same as in 'Los Cascabeles.' Ivana looks for Esteban in Mexico to invite him to a coffee and remember old times.

105.title: Reconciliación
105.plot: José Miguel warns Leonor that for no reason is going to accept Rosendo in his farm, he asks him to run it. Commander Toledo asks Alonso if that of the turn to his life is serious.

106.title: Seducción con resultados
106.plot: Ivana receives the results of the early pregnancy test. She tells Esteban that she already has a father destined for her son. José Miguel and Valentina continue with the construction of the cabin together. They kiss at every opportunity.

107.title: El mejor postor
107.plot: Timoteo tells Iluminada that he is already a free man and has decided to pay attention to Candelaria for the liquefied stand. Leonor tells Ivana that knowing her has her doubts that the son she expects is José Miguel.

108.title: Desengaños
108.plot: Ivana asks Horacio to help him, he begs her for the love he once had for him. Gaby arrives and finds them holding hands. Gaby reveals to Valentina that one night José Miguel arrived home drunk and spent the night with Ivana.

109.title: Ivana embarazada
109.plot: Valentina kisses José Miguel. He emphasizes that he kissed him with love and asks him to forget everything that happened. Ivana is suffering with José Miguel reiterating his love for him. José Miguel rejects it again.

110.title: Leonor corre a Ivana
110.plot: Leonor listens when Rosendo tells Ivana that she loves Valentina. She reiterates her hatred for the owner. Sabino takes Benita on his bicycle to see Chuy. Leonor kicks Ivana out of the hacienda.

111.title: José Miguel Estalla
111.plot: Valentina apologizes to José Miguel, now it is clear that everything they said was lies. José Miguel tells Leonor that from then on he will take the reins of his farm. Gaby and Horacio give their first love kiss.

112.title: Los buenos ganan
112.plot: Isabel confesses to Benita that Ivana is pregnant with José Miguel. Sandra manages to marry Felipe. Ivana receives the analyzes of her new pregnancy tests, the nurse confirms that she is not pregnant.

113.title: Ivana quiere casarse con José Miguel
113.plot: Valentina tries to put a stop to the lies of Ivana, but she argues that Leonor found them naked in José Miguel's bedroom. Major Toledo goes to look for Ivana at 'Los Cascabeles.'

114.title: Celos provocados
114.plot: Alonso tells Valentina how beautiful she is, arrives to have an opportunity to win her back. Valentina receives him in her office, he tells her that he is discovering how rewarding it is to be able to give and that is what he thanks his son.

115.title: Provocaciones
115.plot: Sandra and Felipe spend their first night as husband and wife, full of magic and romance. Valentina receives a huge bouquet of flowers. José Miguel confesses to Valentina that he does not want to lose her.

116.title: Enfrentando la realidad
116.plot: Rosendo tells José Miguel that he intends to keep everything he owns, even with 'the owner', but José Miguel will not be left. José Miguel discovers Valentina with Alonso outside the bank.

117.title: Cárcel segura
117.plot: Rosendo (Sergio Goyri) warns Leonor (Jacqueline Andere) that whoever does it, gets paid. Ivana (Gaby Spanic) goes to look for Felipe (Fabián Robles), he realizes that she killed Oscar (Claudio Báez) and asks him straight.

118.title: Todos en la sindicatura
118.plot: José Miguel tells Alonso that he has more strategy, because he will not be able to win Valentina only with gifts. Alonso tells her that her relationship with her is not going well either and she knows it.

119.title: Ivana alucina a Oscar frente a Isabel
119.plot: Ivana tries to convince Isabel that her happiness is José Miguel but she imagines Oscar, who tells her that she does not deserve to be happy. Valentina goes to look for José Miguel at the cabin and they burn.

120.title: Isabel se declara culpable de asesinato
120.plot: Isabel tells Major Toledo that her daughter Ivana has suffered a lot at the hands of immoral men. Ivana looks in the mirror and complains to herself because she told her mother that she killed Oscar.

121.title: Ivana se entera que Isabel se inculpó
121.plot: Ivana learns that Isabel was accused to save her, wants to see her in jail.

122.title: Alonso se declara asesino
122.plot: Ivana tells Major Toledo that his mother will spend the rest of her life in jail for killing a man.

123.title: Boicot descubierto
123.plot: Valentina finds out that Rosendo is the one who has been boycotting her, while Leonor visits Isabel.

124.title: Pasión desatada
124.plot: Between Ivana and El Comandante Toledo passion is unleashed, while Valentina and José Miguel can not hide their love.

125.title: Trasladada al reclusorio.
125.plot: Alonso invites Santiaguito to spend the weekend with him, he is excited because he will learn to ride a horse and meet Valentina. Meanwhile, Isabel is transferred to the prison.

126.title: El fideicomiso
126.plot: José Miguel will establish a trust for his son and offers his support to Ivana.

127.title: Conclusiones
127.plot: Alonso (David Zepeda) discovers Ivana (Gabriela Spanic) in the hotel, immediately knows that he will furtively see the commander Toledo (Tony Vela). Iluminada (Fatima Torre) cries and says that Timo (Paul Stanley) will not love her anymore because she is no longer pure.

128.title: Toledo sorprendido
128.plot: Rosendo (Sergio Goyri) tells the sending that he is a man of reason and that he does not want to have problems with the law because of José Miguel. Meanwhile, José Miguel tells his mother that Rosendo is already the murderer of his father.

129.title: José Miguel enfrenta a Rosendo
129.plot: Valentina tells José Miguel that she would like to go to church to get married and then go away with him to live his love. Filadelfo tells Valentina to put it to the test.

130.title: Ivana intenta suicidarse
130.plot: Ivana Could Suicide After Having a Nervous Crisis in Front of Benita and Confess Their Crimes.

131.title: Adiós a Benita
131.plot: Iluminada and Crisanta find Benita's body, Valentina prepares her for the funeral and the only one believes that it is a homicide.

132.title: El funeral
132.plot: Valentina runs to Rosendo of the funeral of Benita and finds out that Leonor was so lover.

133.title: Apasionado encuentro
133.plot: José Miguel will leave the Montesinos hacienda and have a passionate meeting with Valentina.

134.title: Rosendo secuestra a Valentina
134.plot: José Miguel confronts Alonso and assures him that the love between him and Valentina is stronger than anything, but Alonso tells him that he has nothing to lose.

135.title: Fechorías
135.plot: The rescue teams get ready, Valentina (Lucero) can not believe they are so close without finding her. Meanwhile, in San Pedro, Iluminada (Fatima Torre) confesses to Timoteo (Paul Stanley) that Rosendo raped her and that's why she can never marry.

136.title: Deslave en la mina
136.plot: Rosendo causes a mudslide in the mine, just over José Miguel and Alonso, thinks he has killed them both.

137.title: Llanto amargo
137.plot: Valentina mourns the death of José Miguel and Alonso, while Rosendo swears it will be his in one way or another.

138.title: Dinamita
138.plot: Rosendo will put dynamite in the mine so that everyone thinks that he and Valentina died buried.

139.title: Rosendo sale de la mina
139.plot: Rosendo has a passionate encounter with Ivana, he thinks to take away Valentina, can Leonor stop him?

140.title: Valentina es rescatada
140.plot: Leonor and Sabino manage to rescue Valentina, while Isabel claims to Ivana the letter that Rosendo left her.

141.title: Secretos y confesiones
141.plot: Benita tries to make Valentina change her mind about her new personality. Filadelfo asks Rosendo if it is true that he is in love with Valentina.

142.title: El padre de José Miguel
142.plot: Rosendo accepts in front of José Miguel that he is in love with Valentina. Ivana tells Valentina that she knows that she is the owner of the hacienda, but that does not stop her from loving José Miguel.

143.title: Crímenes al descubierto
143.plot: At the moment, family and friends go to the church to witness the union of two soulmates who have been forced to overcome all sorts of obstacles to achieve happiness. Once the groom has entered the temple, Seagull appears on the arm of his godfather, Avellaneda. "I give you to a great woman who is like a daughter to me," he tells Rodrigo. Already in front of the altar, he addresses his beloved: "Do you remember? This is where I saw you for the first time. "

144.title: ¿El final de Rosendo?
144.plot: With the help of Dona Jose and encouraged by her love for little Ricardito, Isadora faces with illusion his new life Thanks to her tenacity, she will find work as a History teacher in a school.

145.title: Emprendiendo la huída
145.plot: Practically at the same time, Avellaneda calls Santoveña to inform him of the enormous sacrifice Rodrigo has made and the other tragedies that have occurred in his family. Showing once again his noble and kind character, Alonso leaves aside his feelings and tells Gaviota everything, that, excited, immediately returns to his country.

146.title: Gran final
146.plot: Once he has spoken with the Montalvo women, Gaviota arrives in Tequila and calls the hacienda asking for his beloved, without imagining that he is in town with Román and Crispín. You will find him a few minutes later, while riding a brave bull in a show. Suddenly, Rodrigo is shot down and she runs to his aid, fearing a misfortune. Luckily it has only been a scare and the young man opens his eyes to meet those of the woman of his dreams. Happy, both merge in a passionate kiss.

locations: Televisa San Angel, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico
imdb.plot outline: After her fiancé Alonso leaves her at the alter, Valentina's life is turned upside down. She becomes a different woman and her new attitude sends her to the family's hacienda. There she governs with a firm hand and soon this protagonist becomes the town's villain. Slowly her people with the help of her new neighbor, José Miguel, will warm her heart once more.
imdb.title: A Woman of Steel
plot: After her fiancé Alonso leaves her at the alter, Valentina's life is turned upside down. She becomes a different woman and her new attitude sends her to the family's hacienda. There she governs with a firm hand and soon this protagonist becomes the town's villain. Slowly her people with the help of her new neighbor, José Miguel, will warm her heart once more.
